luascript.code:
print('watch onload\n')
function watch_timer_call_back(arg)
	local watch = gui:getComponentByName('WATCH')
	local sys_time = sys:getTime()
	watch:setWatchTime(sys_time.hour, sys_time.minute, sys_time.second)
end

arg = {}
watch_timer = sys:createTimer(arg, watch_timer_call_back, 500)
watch_timer:run()

local watch = gui:getComponentByName('WATCH')
local sys_time = sys:getTime()
watch:setWatchTime(sys_time.hour, sys_time.minute, sys_time.second, false)

print('watch unload\n')
watch_timer:stop()
sys:deleteTimer(watch_timer)
watch_timer = nil

print("watch touch hold")

local curr_page = gui:getComponentByName('PAGE_0')
curr_page:hide()

local next_page = gui:getComponentByName(0X4020010)
next_page:show()
